home.underheader: A platform using AI to find a partner for various activities
home.activity_underheader: Over 100 activity options for spending time with your teammate
home.spotlight: A state-of-the-art system analyzes your preferences to match you with the most suitable hosts and users, creating a vibrant and engaging community like no other.
home.sessions_underheader: Three types of sessions to suit different activities
home.2us: One-host, one-user session. A personalized and targeted experience allows you to focus on one person's needs and interests
home.joint: Two users and one host. This configuration offers a more dynamic collaborative experience, involving multiple viewpoints and sets of interests
home.alone: A group session with four users and one host. This format promotes social interaction, group activities, and shared experiences among participants
home.hosts_underheader: Users you can create sessions with right now
home.faq2: What are sessions and how do they work?
home.faq4: How fast do the hosts respond?
home.faq5: Do you have any host search filters?
home.ans1: Spotlight AI is a state-of-the-art system that analyzes your preferences - movies, music, games you play - to match you with the most relevant Hosts and users, creating a vibrant and engaging community like no other.
